00025 #ifndef _BASE_RESOURCE_
00026 #define _BASE_RESOURCE_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/Object>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 class ResourceCache;
00035 
00036 class Resource : public Object
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   Resource(const Resource& r) : name(r.name), cache(r.cache) {}
00040   virtual ~Resource() {}
00041 
00042   enum MajorType { GfxType, PhysicsType };
00043   class ResourceType {
00044   public:
00045     ResourceType(Int maj, Int min) { major=maj; minor=min; }
00046     Int major;
00047     Int minor;
00048 
00049     bool operator<(const ResourceType& r) const { return (major==r.major)?(minor<r.minor):(major<r.major); }
00050   };
00051 
00052   virtual const ResourceType& type() const = 0;
00053 
00054 protected:
00055   String name;
00056   ResourceCache& cache;
00057 
00058   explicit Resource(const String& name, ResourceCache& cache) 
00059     : name(name), cache(cache) {}
00060 
00061 private:
00062 
00063   friend class ResourceCache;
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 } // base
00068 
00069 #endif
